name: Shiftry
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.

poke_power.name: Darkness Fan
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Shiftry is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Evolved Pokémon on your opponent’s Bench, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon, and put it back into his or her hand. This power can’t be used if Shiftry is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Spirit Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
